1.title: Fix Configuration Inconsistencies
1.description: Update backend/app/config.py to include all missing environment variables from .env.example
1.details: Add missing API keys (OPENROUTER_API_KEY, GEMINI_API_KEY, QDRANT_KEY), model configurations (OPENROUTER_MODEL, GEMINI_MODEL), fix Neo4j auth format, and add MONGODB_DATABASE setting.

2.title: Update Dependencies to Latest Versions
2.description: Update requirements.txt with latest compatible versions of key dependencies
2.details: Update CrewAI, LangChain, OpenAI client, and other dependencies to latest stable versions while ensuring compatibility.

3.title: Verify Phase 1 Core Functionality
3.description: Test all Phase 1 components to ensure they work correctly with updated configurations
3.details: Test database connections, job queue, worker processes, embedding pipeline, and basic API endpoints.

4.title: Create End-to-End Integration Test
4.description: Develop comprehensive test for the complete chapter generation workflow
4.details: Create test that covers: API request → job queue → worker → agent generation → QA → persistence → response.

5.title: Documentation and Deployment Readiness
5.description: Update documentation and ensure deployment configuration is correct
5.details: Update README, verify docker-compose.yml, ensure all environment variables are documented.
